io.vertx.core.spi.metrics

Interface EventBusMetrics

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Metrics

    public interface EventBusMetrics
extends Metrics
    The event bus metrics SPI which Vert.x will use to call when each event occurs.
    Author:
    Nick Scavelli

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handlerRegistered(String address)
      Called when a handler is registered on the event bus.
      void handlerUnregistered(String address)
      Called when a handler has been unregistered from the event bus.
      void messageReceived(String address)
      Called when a message is received
      void messageSent(String address, boolean publish)
      Called when a message has been sent or published.
      void replyFailure(String address, ReplyFailure failure)
      Called whenever there is a reply failure on the event bus

      • Methods inherited from interface io.vertx.core.spi.metrics.Metrics

        baseName, close, isEnabled

    • Method Detail

      • handlerRegistered

        void handlerRegistered(String address)
        Called when a handler is registered on the event bus.
        Parameters:
        address - the address used to register the handler

      • handlerUnregistered

        void handlerUnregistered(String address)
        Called when a handler has been unregistered from the event bus.
        Parameters:
        address - the address that was used to register the handler

      • messageSent

        void messageSent(String address,
                 boolean publish)
        Called when a message has been sent or published.
        Parameters:
        address - the address
        publish - true if it was a publish

        Called when a message is received
        Parameters:
        address - the address

                  ReplyFailure failure)
        Called whenever there is a reply failure on the event bus
        Parameters:
        address - the address
        failure - the ReplyFailure
